title: Typblography
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108215656/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Blogs](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108215656/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Blogs) : Typblography**

Blog site of [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108215656/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe)'s Type Development team. This blog content covers a wide range of typographic topics from the pros and cons of different type [conferences](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108215656/http:/typophile.com/wiki/conferences) to the technological issues of [PostScript](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108215656/http:/typophile.com/wiki/PostScript) Type 1 and [OpenType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108215656/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OpenType) fonts. This blog was named in [a contest](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108215656/http:/typophile.com/node/15321) right here on [Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108215656/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typophile).

_URL: [http://blogs.adobe.com/typblography](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108215656/http:/blogs.adobe.com/typblography)_
author: Thomas Phinney
